title: Enhancing Organizational Development Competency: STEM Escape Game—Scientific Inquiry Through Collaboration and Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science concepts (physics, chemistry, biology) and simple problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Solving ten complex problems applying scientific principles with over 80% accuracy
Generate three or more effective communication cases through role distribution among team members
Present a detailed process of analyzing real-life problems (e.g., solving environmental pollution) using a scientific approach in five or more steps
Achieve a score of 75 or higher (out of 100) in the comprehensive evaluation after EER activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
